recordings.rmk:
Groans (courtship) at 0:03.0 (with overlapping croaks), 0:32.5 , and 0:39.0 .  Croaks at 0:02.0 , 0:55.0 , 3:05.0 .   Snarls at 0:49.0 .   Gun shot (?) at 2:30.0 with croak and groan.     American Coot Tock at 1:07.0 , a bark and long call at 1:12.0 . 
     Recorded with Sennheiser ME 62 mic, in a 24 inch Roché Parabola, with a Marantz PMD 661 digital recorder

recordings.loc: Wayland, Middlesex County, Massachusetts
recordings.rmk:
Habitat: Open marsh with heron nests in live white pines; one pair occupying dead tree in marsh. Possibly five nests, eight herons counted.
Behavior: One pair incubating. Other pairs nest building and interacting.
Plumage: Adult plumage.

Background noise: Aircraft, auto traffic, leaf blower, wind.

Recorder: Fostex FR-2LE CF
Format: WAV (.BWV), sampling rate 48 kHz, bit depth 24
Microphones: Rode NTG-4+ super-cardioid short shotgun X 2 (stereo pair)
Accessories: DSLR frame, blimps with fur, monitoring headphones
